definition[0]: to cut food, especially meat, into very small pieces, usually using a machine
example[1]: Mince the meat up with some onion and garlic.
definition[1]: to walk with very quick, short steps in a way that looks unnatural or silly
example[2]: She was mincing about in her high-heeled shoes.
definition[2]: meat, especially beef, that has been cut into very small pieces using a special machine
